name: @use.manus.ai/virtualbox-mcp-server
description: A powerful Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for managing VirtualBox VMs via Vagrant.

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --packages=external --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.dev: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --packages=external --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --watch
